price: And I certainly seek refuge with my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me to death[6].
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ
footnotes: [6] Or assault me with your tongues.
